title: SOLD: T206 Hal Chase w/Trophy Black Lenox Back

posts.post_title: SOLD: T206 Hal Chase w/Trophy Black Lenox Back
posts.post_content:
Just three total PSA graded. This one is great looking for the grade as well. Just four public sales in the past 17 years. 

8K delivered.  Email or PM if interested. 


[url=https://flic.kr/p/2pdaEkv][img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/53302581131_9107348cf3_z.jpg[/img][/url]
